name: Pumpkin Cookies
instructions: Mix sugar, pumpkin, shortening, and orange peel.
Drop by teaspoon onto greased cookie sheet.
Remove immediately from sheet and cool.

other.name: Light Brown Glaze
ol: Melt margarine over medium heat until delicate brown.
Add vanilla and milk (one tablespoon at a time) until smooth.

source: Kathy Hatch's Relief Society's Favorite Pumpkin Recipes
